name: @dita/reader
description: A viewer application for EPUB files.

scripts.build: webpack --mode=production && npm run sass && cpx 'dist/*.{css,js,map}' viewer/
scripts.dev: webpack --mode=development && npm run sass && cpx 'dist/*.{css,js,map,woff,woff2}' viewer/
scripts.test: rimraf lib && tsc --p tsconfig-test.json && mocha --require jsdom-global/register --recursive lib/test
scripts.examples: rimraf examples/streamed/readers/viewer && cpx 'viewer/*.{html,css,js,map,woff,woff2}' examples/streamed/readers/viewer && cpx 'viewer/readium-css/*.{html,css,js}' examples/streamed/readers/viewer/readium-css && cpx 'viewer/fonts/*/*.{html,css,js,woff,woff2}' examples/streamed/readers/viewer/fonts
scripts.about: echo 'Do not update @types/parse5 to version 5 or else it will break jsdom typings!'
